00055 namespace TREX {
00056   namespace utils {
00057 
00070     class XmlError :public Exception {
00071     public:
00072       explicit XmlError(std::string const &msg) throw() 
00073        :Exception("XML error: "+msg) {}
00081       XmlError(boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type const &node,
00082               std::string const &msg) throw() 
00083        :Exception(std::string("On ")+
00084                  std::string(node.first)+": "+msg) {}
00086       virtual ~XmlError() throw() {}
00087     }; // TREX::utils::FactoryException
00088     
00089     namespace internals { 
00090       
00100       template<class Ty>
00101       struct attr_helper {
00115         static Ty get(boost::property_tree::ptree const &pt,
00116                       std::string const &name) {
00117           return string_cast<Ty>(pt.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>."+name));
00118         }
00119       }; // TREX::utils::internals::attr_helper<>
00120       
00121       
00122       template<class Ty>
00123       struct attr_helper< boost::optional<Ty> > {
00124         static boost::optional<Ty> get(boost::property_tree::ptree const &pt,
00125                                       std::string const &name) {
00126          boost::optional<std::string> tmp = pt.get_optional<std::string>("<xmlattr>."+name);
00127          if( tmp )
00128            return boost::optional<Ty>(string_cast<Ty>(*tmp));
00129          else 
00130            return boost::optional<Ty>();
00131         }
00132       }; // TREX::utils::internals::attr_helper< boost::optional<> >
00133       
00134     } // TREX::utils::internals
00135     
00154     template<class Ty>
00155     Ty parse_attr(boost::property_tree::ptree const &node, 
00156                 std::string const &attr) {
00157       try {
00158         return internals::attr_helper<Ty>::get(node, attr);
00159       } catch(boost::property_tree::ptree_bad_data const &e) {
00160         throw XmlError("Failed to parse attribute \""+attr+"\": "+e.what());
00161       }
00162     }
00163 
00164     template<class Ty>
00165     Ty parse_attr(boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type const &node, 
00166                 std::string const &attr) {
00167       try {
00168         return parse_attr<Ty>(node.second, attr);
00169       } catch(XmlError const &n) {
00170         throw XmlError(node, n.what());
00171       }
00172     }
00175     template<typename Ty>
00176     void set_attr(boost::property_tree::ptree &node,
00177                 std::string const &attr, Ty const &value) {
00178       node.put("<xmlattr>."+attr, value);
00179     }
00180 
00181     template<typename Ty>
00182     void set_attr(boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type &node,
00183                 std::string const &attr, Ty const &value) {
00184       set_attr(node.second, attr, value);
00185     }
00186     
00187 
00207     template<class Ty>
00208     Ty parse_attr(Ty const &on_missing, 
00209                 boost::property_tree::ptree const &node, 
00210                 std::string const &attr) {
00211       boost::optional<Ty> ret = parse_attr< boost::optional<Ty> >(node, attr);
00212       if( !ret )
00213         ret.reset(on_missing);
00214       return *ret;
00215     }
00216 
00217     template<class Ty>
00218     Ty parse_attr(Ty const &on_missing, 
00219                 boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type const &node, 
00220                 std::string const &attr) {
00221       try {
00222         return parse_attr<Ty>(on_missing, node.second, attr);
00223       } catch(XmlError const &n) {
00224         throw XmlError(node, n.what());
00225       }
00226     }
00227 
00228 
00236     inline bool is_tag(boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type const &node,
00237                      std::string const &tag) {
00238       return tag==node.first;
00239     }

00242                std::string const &conf, bool ahead=true);
